entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
